backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and daily workout stats with access control, day-based queries, and profile saving.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining stored state types and a no-op migration that returns the prior actor data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend error-handling requirement to specific files and components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their functionality and roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom OKLCH color variables defining light and dark theme styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring router, query client, themes, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling login/logout flows with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter a name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout with header, navigation tabs, login button, profile dialog, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/features/counter/CounterScr: Main pull-up counter UI handling reps, daily totals, goals, and authenticated vs guest logic.
frontend/src/features/counter/ResetSessi: Dialog prompting the user to confirm resetting the current set counter.
frontend/src/features/counter/ResetToday: Dialog prompting the user to confirm resetting today's total reps.
Empty placeholder for a rest timer component.
frontend/src/features/counter/useLocalDa: Hook for storing and retrieving today's pull-up goal in localStorage with day rollover handling.
frontend/src/features/counter/useLocalTo: Hook managing today's reps and sets in localStorage with automatic reset on day change.
frontend/src/features/counter/useWorkout: Empty placeholder for workout session logic.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryLis: Empty placeholder for listing past workout history.
frontend/src/features/history/SessionDet: Empty placeholder for viewing details of a past session.
frontend/src/features/stats/StatsView.ts: Stats screen displaying daily or selected-date reps, sets, and goal progress for authenticated or guest users.
frontend/src/features/stats/useUserStats: Empty placeholder for user stats logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication provider and hook for loading, maintaining, and exposing Internet Identity state and login actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for loading and mutating user profile, daily totals, stats, and goals using an actor from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes with OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, configuring React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/dayStamp.ts: Provides helpers to convert dates and strings to bigint day stamps and get today's date values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, containers, and animations using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing scope, issues, and feature requirements for the pull-up counter app.
